textList.text: A Lizard ship is being aggressive towards you: "I know it was the aliens, who plotted the demise of our great species. Time for revenge!"
"Federation, huh? Well, there were you when we, the Lizards, needed help?" The frustrated captain of a Lizard ship attacks!
A captain of a Lizard ship nearby is ranting: "First, the cataclysm, then, the Rebellion. It all started when we made a mistake of joining the Federation. Time for it to be destroyed."
After the cataclysm, many Lizard captains have turned to piracy in desperation. You encounter a ship belonging to one of those captains.
A scaled face with glowing eyes appears on a vidscreen: "I'm collecting a toll here. The only way to pay is with your lives."
The Lizard space was peaceful long ago, when the military routinely cleared the space of pirates. Now, the Lizard military became the pirates themselves.

event.name: LIZARD_REBEL_FIGHT
event.text: A Rebel scout has penetrated deep into Lizard space, no doubt searching for you. There are no Lizard ships nearby to help you.
